title: 10min wait times after client shut down and computer froze randomly during game loading 3x
body: It doesn't seem to glitch any more after i tried a fix i found. Can i try appeal my 10min waits i loaded bot games so shouldn't of been too bad

replies.body: Heeeey I'm glad you were able to find a good fix for your issue! It looks like you've only got 2 games left for your LPQ, so you'll be getting queues faster soon.
If u fixed it it was on your end not riot's end. So stop swearing and complaining. Fitting summoner name is fitting.
